verses.text: Now \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \add and\add* \w stricken|strong="H0935"\w* in \w years|strong="H3117"\w*; and they \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* him with \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, but he gat no \w heat|strong="H3179"\w*.\f + \fr 1.1 \ft stricken…: Heb. entered into days\f*

Wherefore his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Let there be \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* for my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* a \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*: and let her \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and let her \w cherish|strong="H5532"\w* him, and let her \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* in thy \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, that my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* may get \w heat|strong="H2552"\w*.\f + \fr 1.2 \ft Let there…: Heb. Let them seek\f*\f + \fr 1.2 \ft a young…: Heb. a damsel, a virgin\f*\f + \fr 1.2 \ft cherish…: Heb. be a cherisher unto him\f*

So they \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* for a \w fair|strong="H3303"\w* \w damsel|strong="H5291"\w* throughout all the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w Abishag|strong="H0049"\w* a \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* her to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And the \w damsel|strong="H5291"\w* \add was\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w fair|strong="H3303"\w*, and \w cherished|strong="H5532"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* to him: but the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* her not.

¶ Then \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w* \w exalted|strong="H4984"\w* himself, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I will be \w king|strong="H4427"\w*: and he \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* him \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* to \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft be king: Heb. reign\f*

And his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had not \w displeased|strong="H6087"\w* him at any \w time|strong="H3117"\w* in \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Why hast thou done \w so|strong="H6213"\w*? and he also \add was a\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w* \add man;\add* and \add his mother\add* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft at any…: Heb. from his days\f*

And he \w conferred|strong="H1697"\w* with \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, and with \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: and they \w following|strong="H0310"\w* \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* \add him\add*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft he…: Heb. his words were with\f*\f + \fr 1.7 \ft following…: Heb. helped after Adonijah\f*

But \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*, and \w Rei|strong="H7472"\w*, and the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* which \add belonged\add* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, were not with \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w*.

And \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* \w slew|strong="H2076"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* and \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* and fat \w cattle|strong="H4806"\w* by the \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* of \w Zoheleth|strong="H2120"\w*, which \add is\add* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* \w En-rogel|strong="H5883"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* all his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*:\f + \fr 1.9 \ft En-rogel: or, the well Rogel\f*

But \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, and the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, and \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* not.

¶ Wherefore \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* the \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Hast thou not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w* doth \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* our \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add* not?

Now therefore \w come|strong="H3212"\w*, let me, I pray thee, give thee \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*, that thou mayest \w save|strong="H4422"\w* thine own \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, and the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and get thee \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Didst not thou, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* unto thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Assuredly|strong="H3588"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* me, and he shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon my \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*? why then doth \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*?

Behold, while thou yet \w talkest|strong="H1696"\w* there with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, I also will come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee, and \w confirm|strong="H4390"\w* thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 1.14 \ft confirm: Heb. fill up\f*

¶ And \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* into the \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*: and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* was \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*; and \w Abishag|strong="H0049"\w* the \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w bowed|strong="H6915"\w*, and did \w obeisance|strong="H7812"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What wouldest thou?\f + \fr 1.16 \ft What…: Heb. What to thee?\f*

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, My \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, thou \w swarest|strong="H7650"\w* by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* unto thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, \add saying\add*, Assuredly \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* me, and he shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon my \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*.
And now, behold, \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* \w reigneth|strong="H4427"\w*; and now, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add* not:

And he hath \w slain|strong="H2076"\w* \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w* and fat \w cattle|strong="H4806"\w* and \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, and hath \w called|strong="H7121"\w* all the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*: but \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* hath he not \w called|strong="H7121"\w*.

And thou, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add are\add* upon thee, that thou shouldest \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* them who shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him.

Otherwise it shall come to pass, when my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, that I and my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* shall be counted \w offenders|strong="H2400"\w*.\f + \fr 1.21 \ft offenders: Heb. sinners\f*
¶ And, lo, while she yet \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* also came \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

And they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*. And when he was come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, he \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* himself before the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* with his \w face|strong="H0639"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

And \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, hast thou \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* me, and he shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon my \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*?

For he is gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and hath \w slain|strong="H2076"\w* \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w* and fat \w cattle|strong="H4806"\w* and \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, and hath \w called|strong="H7121"\w* all the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*; and, behold, they \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, God \w save|strong="H2421"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w*.\f + \fr 1.25 \ft God…: Heb. Let king Adonijah live\f*

But me, \add even\add* me thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, and thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, hath he not \w called|strong="H7121"\w*.

Is this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w done|strong="H1961"\w* by my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and thou hast not \w shewed|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, who should \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him?

¶ Then \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* me \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w*. And she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 1.28 \ft into…: Heb. before the king\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, that hath \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* out of all \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*,

Even as I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thee by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Assuredly \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* me, and he shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon my \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* in my stead; even so will I certainly \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Then \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w bowed|strong="H6915"\w* with \add her\add* \w face|strong="H0639"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and did \w reverence|strong="H7812"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* me \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*. And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* also \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* with you the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of your \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, and cause \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* to \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* upon mine own \w mule|strong="H6506"\w*, and bring him \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Gihon|strong="H1521"\w*:\f + \fr 1.33 \ft mine…: Heb. which belongeth to me\f*

And let \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* him there \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* ye with the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, God \w save|strong="H2421"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

Then ye shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, that he may \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon my \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*; for he shall be \w king|strong="H4427"\w* in my stead: and I have \w appointed|strong="H6680"\w* him to be \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and over \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* so \add too\add*.

As the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath been with my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, even so be he with \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and \w make|strong="H1431"\w* his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w greater|strong="H1431"\w* than the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

So \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, and the \w Cherethites|strong="H3774"\w*, and the \w Pelethites|strong="H6432"\w*, went \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and caused \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* to \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* upon \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w mule|strong="H6506"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* him to \w Gihon|strong="H1521"\w*.

And \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* an \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* out of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, and \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*. And they \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*; and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, God \w save|strong="H2421"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w piped|strong="H2490"\w* with \w pipes|strong="H2485"\w*, and \w rejoiced|strong="H8056"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, so that the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w rent|strong="H1234"\w* with the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of them.\f + \fr 1.40 \ft pipes: or, flutes\f*

¶ And \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* and all the \w guests|strong="H7121"\w* that \add were\add* with him \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add* as they had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w eating|strong="H0398"\w*. And when \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore \add is this\add* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* being in an \w uproar|strong="H1993"\w*?

And while he yet \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, behold, \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*: and \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*; for thou \add art\add* a \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w bringest|strong="H1319"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w*.

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w*, \w Verily|strong="H0061"\w* our \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* hath made \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* with him \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, and the \w Cherethites|strong="H3774"\w*, and the \w Pelethites|strong="H6432"\w*, and they have caused him to \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* upon the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w mule|strong="H6506"\w*:

And \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* have \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* him \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Gihon|strong="H1521"\w*: and they are come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from thence \w rejoicing|strong="H8056"\w*, so that the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* rang \w again|strong="H1949"\w*. This \add is\add* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* that ye have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.
And also \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w*.

And moreover the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* our \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* make the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w better|strong="H3190"\w* than thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w make|strong="H1431"\w* his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w greater|strong="H1431"\w* than thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* himself upon the \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*.

And also thus \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \add one\add* to \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* on my \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* even \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*.

And all the \w guests|strong="H7121"\w* that \add were\add* with \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* were \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*, and rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

¶ And \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and caught \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* on the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.
